attributes.action: STOP BT OPENREACH ENGINEERS CHARGING £100+ FOR CALL OUT TO YOUR HOUSE
attributes.background: BT OPENREACH CHARGING US RESIDENTS  £100+ CALL OUT FOR PROBLEMS WITH EITHER INSIDE OR OUTSIDE PROPERTY THAT ONLY THEY HAVE SET UP. SIGN THIS PETITION TO PUT A STOP TO THESE OVER CHARGES

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. BT is a private company and the UK Government and Parliament is not responsible for what it decides to charge.
